name: Zib MedicationUse ReasonForChangeOrDiscontinuationOfUse
title: HCIM MedicationUse ReasonForChangeOrDiscontinuationOfUse
description: Information about the reason for changing or discontinuing use of medication based on a reference as defined by the Dutch Health and Care Information models (Dutch: Zorginformatiebouwsteen or zib) 'MedicationUse'.
purpose: To provide information about the reason for changing or discontinuing use of medication. Currently, there is no field avaiblable in a MedicationStatement resource for this information, hence the reason for this extension.
